Source.Name: libisofs
Source.Summary: libisofs is a library to create an ISO-9660 filesystem with extensions like RockRidge or Joliet
Source.Description: libisofs is a library to create an ISO-9660 filesystem with extensions like RockRidge or Joliet. It is also a full featured ISO-9660 editor, allowing you to modify an ISO image or multisession disc, including file addition/removal, change of file names and attributes, etc.
